Package fragment

Class Fragment

java.lang.Object
fragment.Fragment
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeathFragment, GameFragment, MenuFragment, PauseFragment
public abstract class Fragment
extends java.lang.Object
Abstracted functionality for game fragments is kept here

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected boolean active
    Represents whether or not the fragment is currently active
    protected Component[] components
    The collection of components that the fragment is intending to display
    protected SnakeGame gameInstance
    The game instance this Fragment belongs to

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Fragment​(SnakeGame g)
    Construct the Fragment and request the components

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Fragment activate()
    Activates the fragment to allow update and draw requests to reach the components
    private boolean checkEventWithinComponent​(Component c, java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
    Checks if the mouse event provided has landed within the component provided
    void createComponents()
    Create a default empty-set of components to ensure the class fields are fully initialised
    Fragment deactivate()
    Deactivates the fragment to block update and draw requests from reaching the components
    void mouseMoved​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
    Dispatches the mouse event to the components

    Dispatches the mouse event to the components
    void mouseReleased​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
    Dispatches the mouse event to the components
    void redraw()
    Redraws the components registered
    void update​(double dt)
    Updates the components registered

  • Constructor Details

    • Fragment

      public Fragment​(SnakeGame g)
      Construct the Fragment and request the components
      Parameters:
      g - The SnakeGame the fragment belongs to

  • Method Details

    • createComponents

      public void createComponents()
      Create a default empty-set of components to ensure the class fields are fully initialised

    • activate

      public Fragment activate()
      Activates the fragment to allow update and draw requests to reach the components
      Returns:
      Returns the same fragment to enable chaining

    • deactivate

      public Fragment deactivate()
      Deactivates the fragment to block update and draw requests from reaching the components
      Returns:
      Returns the same fragment to enable chaining

    • update

      public void update​(double dt)
      Updates the components registered
      Parameters:
      dt - Time passed since last update

    • redraw

      public void redraw()
      Redraws the components registered

    • checkEventWithinComponent

      private boolean checkEventWithinComponent​(Component c, java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
      Checks if the mouse event provided has landed within the component provided
      Parameters:
      c - The component to be tested against the event
      event - The mouse event to being checked
      Returns:
      Returns true if the mouse event landed inside the components, false otherwise

    • mousePressed

      public void mousePressed​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
      Dispatches the mouse event to the components
      Parameters:
      event - The MouseEvent to be dispatched

      Dispatches the mouse event to the components
      Parameters:
